Corporate Citizenship

Human Rights and 
Community Relations
Employee Welfare
 Continuous Development
 Health and Safety
At AerCap, we aim to grow not only 
sustainably, but also responsibly. This extends to the recognition of the principles of human rights, our practice of attracting and retaining the best talent in the industry, our engagement with the societies that we work and live in and our care for the health and safety of our employees, customers and suppliers
